Hero.headline: Your new website will be fast, readable and simple to use every day.
Hero.subheadline: I'm Kacper, Frontend Developer — I make websites and applications that load fast, look good on every device and are easy to use.

About.title: About Me
About.heading: Passion for code, obsession with details.
About.description: Hi, I'm Kacper — a frontend developer from Toruń who treats code like a hobby horse race: with full commitment and a bit of healthy madness. I build fast and accessible sites in React/Next.js, optimizing every millisecond like it's a personal challenge. By day, I study Computer Science at UMK; by night, I test ideas at hackathons and in cafes (preferably ones with fast Wi-Fi and even faster espresso ☕). Yes, that's me on a hobby horse in the photo — because life's too short to take everything seriously, but code? Code should always be clean, performant, and pixel-perfect.

todo.title: To do manager
todo.subtitle: Daily task management
todo.description: Transform your 'musts' into 'dones'. A simple tool for achieving daily goals.

anime.title: HelloAnime!
anime.subtitle: Your Anime world center
anime.description: HelloAnime! is a modern platform for discovering anime, using the Jikan API. Browse, search, and check details of your favorite series in a beautiful, responsive interface.

kas.title: Smuggling Detection System
kas.subtitle: AI-powered customs inspection
kas.description: Hackathon project for the National Tax Administration (KAS) utilizing a trained ML model to detect smuggled goods in images. Built the frontend with real-time WebSocket communication to connect with the backend ML inference engine.

PrivacyPolicy.description: Your privacy is my priority. Below you will find detailed information about how I take care of your data.

NotFound.title: Oops! We couldn't find your page
NotFound.description: Sorry, but this page does not exist

placeholders.name: Enter your name

placeholders.message: Tell us what you have in mind...

info.title: Let's Build Your Success
info.description: Looking for professional solutions that will make your company stand out on the market? Don't wait for a better moment. Write to me, and together we will create a project that will delight your customers and bring real profits.

q1.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
q1.author: Peter Drucker

q2.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
q2.author: Cory House

q3.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
q3.author: John Johnson

q4.text: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
q4.author: Oscar Wilde
